name: Greenstone City
description: A bustling city built around a massive, glowing green stone structure.
image_prompt_positive: Fantasy city, large green glowing crystal monolith in center, medieval architecture, busy market streets, magical atmosphere, bright sunlight, detailed textures, 4k
image_prompt_negative: dark, ruins, futuristic, sci-fi, blurry, low resolution, artifacts

points_of_interest.name: Market District
points_of_interest.description: A crowded maze of stalls selling everything from fresh produce to minor magical trinkets. The scent of roasted meats and spices fills the air.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Medieval market, crowded, colorful stalls, spices, sunlight, fantasy city

points_of_interest.name: The Greenstone Monolith
points_of_interest.description: The massive, glowing green crystal for which the city is named. It hums with a low resonance that can be felt in your bones.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Huge glowing green crystal monolith, city square, people worshipping, magical light

points_of_interest.name: City Gates
points_of_interest.description: Imposing iron-reinforced wooden gates manned by the city guard. Banners of the ruling council hang from the battlements.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Large wooden gates, stone walls, guards, banners, fantasy city entrance

points_of_interest.name: The Guild Hall
points_of_interest.description: A grand stone building where adventurers gather to take contracts and trade information.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Stone guild hall, adventurer gathering, notice board, interior tavern style

name: The Whispering Woods
description: A dense forest where the trees seem to murmur secrets to those who listen.

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Grove
points_of_interest.description: A circle of massive, ancient trees that seem to watch you. The air here is still and heavy with magic.
points_of_interest.image_prompt: Ancient trees, circle layout, magical atmosphere, fireflies, moss

points_of_interest.name: The Singing Stream
points_of_interest.description: A crystal-clear stream that makes melodic sounds as it flows over smooth stones.

points_of_interest.name: Shadowed Clearing
points_of_interest.description: A part of the woods where the canopy is so thick that it is always twilight. Unsettling movements can be seen in the corners of your vision.

name: Crystal Caverns
